skills.skill: American Heart Association BLS and ACLS

duties_responsibilities.duty: Fill short and long-term assignments throughout the health system.
Float throughout the hospital and/or throughout multiple hospital locations.

education_certification.credential: Registered Nurse, RN license – current within the state you wish to practice.
Current American Heart Association BLS and ACLS. Additional certifications required depending on area of specialty.
18 months to two years of current experience in desired practice area.
Willingness to float throughout the hospital and/or throughout multiple hospital locations.
